home.brief: Hi, my name is Santiago, I'm Frontend Developer with Full-Stack knowledge.

about.title: About me
about.firstParagraph: Frontend developer with extensive experience in React, I also have knowledge in fullstack development. I'm passionate about everything about technology and innovation.
about.secondParagraph: I work daily using agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban. I'm currently learning React Native, and implementing best practices for a cleaner and more scalable frontend.

projects.title: Projects
projects.brief: Some of my most important or recent projects that I have been working on.
